welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Frankfurt, a city known for its unique blend of modern skyscrapers and charming historic districts. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore the city's rich culture, delicious cuisine, and lively atmosphere."

restaurants.name: Restaurant Mainpromenade
restaurants.description: Restaurant Mainpromenade is a greek restaurant located in Offenbach am Main.

restaurants.name: Bootshaus Bürgel
restaurants.description: Bootshaus Bürgel is a greek restaurant located in Offenbach am Main.

restaurants.name: Burger AG

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reichelsheim Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Reichelsheim Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.
